text: Hey Zach I am seeing the same now — I can pull actions for _Contact_ Workflows.  I am noticing that Deal Workflows and Company Workflows are not supported (error thrown), and do not appear to have a separate API call available…?
That’s correct we do not yet have an API for non-Contact Workflows. That’s something that team is working on but aren’t comfortable talking about a timeline just yet

FYI, not sure if this is your team, but more than an API for these workflow types, I’d like to see this functionality - specifically ability to compare date properties against each other in company and deal workflows, or to make cross-object comparisons (e.g., “Contact DateFieldX is before Company DateFieldY”):  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Date-filters-Improve-Options-Across-all-of-HubSpot-Master-Idea/idi-p/276818>
